Html:
Hello,

WPP was running and running. But today I opend and WPP says that the certificate was expired. But the certificate has the Deadline in 2018. It is a AD-certifcate.

Now I create a new certificate but I`m not able to Import it. Error message:
"error while loading of the certificate, please check the file"

Has someone an idea?

Kind regards
Sabine from Germany
